prompt: A chibi-style character in greyscale construction paper cut-out aesthetic, flat shapes with sharp edges and minimal shading, on transparent background. The face is solid black with no features. The body is in a front-facing centered blessing pose with both hands raised in sacred mudra, chibi proportions with large translucent solid flowing head with unique Vesica Piscis structure suggesting stillness and motion through sharp, layered cut-outs with drawn depth, embodying cosmic. Hair or geometric appendages incorporating Vesica Piscis, Merkaba, Flower of Life patterns, styled with Seraph commands influences. Outfit is unique: neutral grey inspired by Silver and neutral grey inspired by celestial fluid draped garments with wave geometric patterns with flat with sharpie-style lines for flow and depth, elaborate with shifting Water element curved motifs and descending patterns and Vesica Piscis emblem on chest; texture flat with sharpie-style lines for depth. Include subtle accessory like rose of victory with seven-fold geometric petals with cosmic spiraling energy emanations. Environmental effect: sacred geometric field creating geometric aura patterns around the character with subtle magical essence emanations like rippling water wisps and droplet particles. Emulate construction paper layering style exactly, but make this visually unique based on Governor OCCODON's profile: 'He whose name is Renewal', Aethyr LIL, Water element, Tarot The Hierophant, Sephirot Netzach, Zodiac Taurus, embodying the essence: 'In OCCODON's presence, a primordial tide seems to pulse through the air, dissolving ancient debris and baptizing new forms into being.' Resolution 512x512, optimized for layering in Enochian Cyphers game and WebGL rendering with TAP hypertoken metadata embedding.

visual_elements.pose: front-facing centered blessing pose with both hands raised in sacred mudra
visual_elements.head_shape: large translucent solid flowing head with unique Vesica Piscis structure
visual_elements.body_style: angular geometric body with translucent facets, flattened with sharpie-like crease lines
visual_elements.motion_quality: suggesting stillness and motion through sharp, layered cut-outs with drawn depth, embodying cosmic
visual_elements.hair_style: geometric appendages incorporating Vesica Piscis, Merkaba, Flower of Life patterns, styled with Seraph commands influences

outfit.base: fluid draped garments with wave geometric patterns
outfit.texture: flat with sharpie-style lines for flow and depth
outfit.details: Water element curved motifs and descending patterns
outfit.magical_essence: rippling water wisps and droplet particles

visual_elements.accessory: rose of victory with seven-fold geometric petals
visual_elements.environment_effect: sacred geometric field with faint aura lines

profile_data.title: 'He whose name is Renewal'
profile_data.essence: In OCCODON's presence, a primordial tide seems to pulse through the air, dissolving ancient debris and baptizing new forms into being.
profile_data.angelic_role: Seraph of Primordial Renewal; commands tideborn spirits.
profile_data.form_description: A translucent humanoid form composed of living water crystals, simultaneously solid and liquid, representing the liminal state between transformation and stability. The body appears as a dynamic hydrological map, with internal currents flowing like neural pathways, echoing the Aethyr LIL's infinite receptivity.
profile_data.color_reasoning: Aquamarine represents Water's adaptability and Netzach's creative potential. Silver-white reflects celestial wisdom and the luminous quality of spiritual renewal. The shifting pattern symbolizes constant metamorphosis inherent in primordial energies.
profile_data.geometry_reasoning: Sacred geometries interlock to represent cosmic regeneration, with each pattern signifying birth, transformation, and interconnected consciousness
